reviews.review: This game is amazing and I would recommend it to even people who don't often play puzzle games. Its just amazing
it's a pretty not bad game

One of the best games of all time in my opinion. This game is such a masterpiece and I loved every bit of it. The characters are funny and great, The puzzles are very fun to complete and satisfying when you do. This game is just beyond amazing. Hope to see a Portal 3. I just love this game so much

Отличная игра, где можно хорошо провести время с друзьями и по раскинуть мозгами, за частую бывают довольно сложные уровни где надо неплохо так напрячь извилины. Интересный сюжет, хорошая прлработка локаций, сама по себе игра стабильная за почти 10 часов геймплея не вылетала.

Good game: one of the best. Puzzles are fun and creative; more advanced than the first [i]Portal[/i], but not annoyingly complex or difficult. Storyline and worldbuilding are remarkable, and the voice acting is strong. Memorable locales and an overall great experience. I highly recommend this game!
only hot men play this game
Bonito juego, mejor diseño de niveles, 10/10 lo jugaría otra vez
单人流程略短，谜题难度适中，想明白了其实都非常简单，连我这样的笨蛋都能通关。就算是三十几块钱原价入也是绝对值得，更别说多人合作还是额外剧情。

Co-op modu aşırı eğlenceli. Ama beyin gerektiriyor, bu yüzden de arkadaşım bölümleri geçmeye çalışırken etrafta avel avel dolanıyorum.

This game is special to me. It's made by Valve, and it was given to me by my Grandma. I really love this game. I completed it and adore it's universe (as it is even in the same one as Half-Life). I definetly reocmmend this game, specially that, at the time this review is being made, it only costs R$4,13.
De los mejores juegos que he jugado. La mecánica de portales es muy entretenida, la historia es súper interesante y los diálogos son una risa. Recomendado al 100%
What can I say that hasn't already been said? This game got me into Xbox gaming seven years ago. Absolutely love it.

Во всем превосходит первую часть. Сложность головоломок, длительность прохождения, сюжет, графика, озвучка, мультиплеер... Очень рекомендую пройти, но прежде ознакомьтесь с предысторией в первой части, дабы понимать что к чему.
